In England, in the seven days to 20 May, there were 12,639 new confirmed cases (22.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 13 May, there were 11,908 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 6% (731 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 25 May is 3,899,813 (6,928.4 cases per 100,000 population).
